outfit_data.top: A sapphire silk blouse with a flowing empire waist and delicate ruffles along the sleeves. The fabric drapes elegantly, adding a touch of luxury to the sporty style.
outfit_data.bottom: Emerald green satin wide-leg pants with a flattering high-waisted silhouette. The luxurious satin material adds a touch of glamour while remaining comfortable for a beach setting.
outfit_data.shoes: Ruby red leather espadrille wedges. These offer both height and comfort, perfect for navigating the sand and mingling at the clam bake.
outfit_data.extras: A soft amethyst cashmere shawl can be draped over the shoulders for cooler evenings by the ocean.
